results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Vegetarian Lasagne.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["8 lasagna noodles", "1 medium eggplant, sliced", "1 cup ricotta cheese", "1 cup shredded mozzarella", "1/2 cup grated Parmesan", "1 tsp dried basil", "1 tsp dried oregano", "Salt and pepper to taste", "1 cup marinara sauce", "1 cup frozen spinach, thawed and drained"], "steps": ["Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).", "Step 2: Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.", "Step 3: In a large skillet, sauté the sliced eggplant in olive oil until golden brown. Season with salt, pepper, basil, and oregano. Set aside.", "Step 4: In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, mozzarella, Parmesan, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.", "Step 5: Spread a layer of marinara sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish. Arrange 4 lasagna noodles on top.", "Step 6: Spread half of the ricotta mixture over the noodles, followed by half of the sautéed eggplant and half of the spinach. Sprinkle with half of the mozzarella cheese.", "Step 7: Repeat the layers, starting with the marinara sauce, noodles, ricotta mixture, eggplant, spinach, and mozzarella cheese.", "Step 8: Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.", "Step 9: Let the lasagna rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving."]

results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Pepperoni Pizza.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["1 lb pizza dough", "1 cup tomato sauce", "8 oz mozzarella cheese", "12 slices pepperoni", "1 tsp dried oregano", "1 tsp garlic powder"], "steps": ["step 1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).", "step 2: Roll out the pizza dough into a circle or rectangle shape, depending on your preference.", "step 3: Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.", "step 4: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the sauce.", "step 5: Arrange the pepperoni slices on top of the cheese.", "step 6: Sprinkle the dried oregano and garlic powder over the pepperoni for added flavor.", "step 7: Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.", "step 8: Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving."]

results.prompt:
Give me a clear, step-by-step recipe for Chicken Burger.
Include ingredients and cooking instructions.
Return your output strictly in the following format:
{"ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2", ...], "steps": ["step 1", "step 2", ...]}
Do not include any text outside this JSON object.
results.output: {"ingredients": ["1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast", "1/4 cup panko breadcrumbs", "1 egg", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 teaspoon salt", "1/2 teaspoon black pepper", "1/4 teaspoon paprika", "4 hamburger buns", "lettuce", "tomato", "cheese (optional)", "mayonnaise or spread"], "steps": ["Step 1: Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.", "Step 2: In a shallow dish, mix together panko breadcrumbs and paprika.", "Step 3: In another shallow dish, beat the egg.", "Step 4: Season the chicken breast with salt and black pepper.", "Step 5: Dip each side of the chicken breast in the beaten egg, then coat in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently to adhere.", "Step 6: Heat the olive oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium heat.", "Step 7: Add the coated chicken breast to the skillet and cook for about 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through.", "Step 8: Meanwhile, toast the hamburger buns on the grill or in a toaster.", "Step 9: Assemble the burgers by spreading mayonnaise or spread on the bottom bun, followed by a lettuce leaf, tomato slice, cheese (if using), and finally the chicken burger patty.", "Step 10: Top with the top bun and serve immediately."]}
